title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/vue-rss
author: oeyoews
name: vue-rss
readme:
!! Usage

```
<$vue-rss rss="https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/latest.rss" />
```

!! Example

<$vue-rss rss="https://www.ajplus.net/stories?format=rss" />

<$vue-rss />

<$vue-rss rss="https://tiddlywiki.substack.com/feed"/>

<$vue-rss rss="https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/latest.rss" />

<hr />

!! Tips

* more rss address please check https://docs.rsshub.app/
* rsshub radar chrome extension can help you find some website rss address

!! NOTE

* This plugin uses https://corsproxy.io/ for proxy forwarding, which require a special network environment for some countries
* proxy has cdn cache

!! Roadmap

* support IOS: proxy forwarding not supported by IOS now
* support save single article convert to tiddler

<!-- plugin template readme -->

!! Motivation

* rss to html, to md
* https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/fun-with-feeds-a-proof-of-concept-rss-reader/6490/
